scenes.description: Countdown sequence and title card for Hololive Countdown Live.
Promotional video for the Hololive Fan Club featuring Ichijou Ririka and Mori Calliope.
Transition visuals for Official Shop and Year-End/New-Year Voice packs.
Date voice preview segment (Year-End version) featuring AZKi, Mococo, Okayu, and Fuwawa.
Panic before the countdown, followed by the New Year countdown.
Date voice preview segment (New Year version) and final group greeting.

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンクラブ！
subtitles.english: Hololive Fan Club!

subtitles.original: 一条莉々華だよ！
subtitles.english: It's Ichijou Ririka!

subtitles.original: I'm Mori Calliope!
subtitles.english: I'm Mori Calliope!

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンクラブ、始めました！
subtitles.english: We've started the Hololive Fan Club!

subtitles.original: ここだけのオリジナルグッズや、チケット先行抽選。
subtitles.english: Exclusive original goods and advance ticket lotteries.

subtitles.original: 他にも楽しいコンテンツがいっぱい！
subtitles.english: Lots of other fun content too!

subtitles.original: Campaigns too? That sounds really fun.
subtitles.english: Campaigns too? That sounds really fun.

subtitles.original: I'm curious.
subtitles.english: I'm curious.

subtitles.original: さあみんな！ホロライブファンクラブで一緒に楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Come on everyone! Let's have fun together in the Hololive Fan Club!

subtitles.original: Join us now!
subtitles.english: Join us now!

subtitles.original: ここは露天風呂が有名だって言うから、ずっと気になってたんだよね～！
subtitles.english: I heard the open-air bath here is famous, so I've been curious about it for a long time!

subtitles.original: ……ね、キミも一緒に行かない？
subtitles.english: ...Hey, won't you go with me?

subtitles.original: えっ！？一緒に入るって意味じゃないよ！？
subtitles.english: Eh!? I don't mean we get in together!?

subtitles.original: おーそーじ！
subtitles.english: Big, Big, Clean, Up!

subtitles.original: モココ、大掃除やってみたいんだよね！
subtitles.english: I want to try this "Big Cleanup" thing!

subtitles.original: もちろんキミも一緒にやるんだよ！？
subtitles.english: And of course, you'll be joining me!

subtitles.original: じゃあさっそく大掃除、開始だ～！
subtitles.english: In that case, let the Big cleanup begin!

subtitles.original: え～？服のすきまがどうしたって～？
subtitles.english: Eh~? What about the gap in my clothes~?

subtitles.original: 僕が掃除している間に、キミはいったいどこを見てたのかな～？
subtitles.english: While I was cleaning, where on earth were you looking~?

subtitles.original: お～！ここが夢にまで見た日本の温泉町～♪
subtitles.english: Wow! I've always dreamed of going to Japan's hot springs districts!

subtitles.original: ん？もしかして……私と一緒に入りたいなとか、思ってる？
subtitles.english: ...what's that look? Are you hoping for the mixed one?

subtitles.original: ……いいよ、一緒に、入ろっか……？
subtitles.english: ...You know what? Sure, let's go there.

subtitles.original: って、やばいやばい！
subtitles.english: Wait, oh no oh no!

subtitles.original: みんなそろそろカウントダウン始まるよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, the countdown is starting soon!

subtitles.original: Happy New Year!
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: あけましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: 今年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I look forward to working with you this year too!

subtitles.original: えへへ……なんか改めてかしこまると、恥ずかしくて照れちゃうね♪
subtitles.english: Ehe... somehow being formal like this makes me feel shy♪

subtitles.original: ダイヤモンド富士っていうんだっけ？
subtitles.english: It's called Diamond Fuji, right?

subtitles.original: ほらほら！だんだん富士山の輪郭が見えて来たよ！
subtitles.english: Look, look! You can start to see the outline of Mt. Fuji!

subtitles.original: なんだかもう、この景色だけで感動するよ～！
subtitles.english: Just seeing this scenery is so moving~!

subtitles.original: 突然ですが、おせちを作りまーす！
subtitles.english: This is sudden, but I'll be making osechi!

subtitles.original: つまみぐいしちゃだめだよ？
subtitles.english: And no sneaking a bite, you hear?

subtitles.original: もしつまみぐいしちゃったら……
subtitles.english: If you do sneak a bite...

subtitles.original: ガブってしちゃうからねっ！？
subtitles.english: Bau wau! I'll take a big chomp out of you!

subtitles.original: おめでとー！おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year! Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: キミとぎゅーしながらお祝い♪
subtitles.english: Celebrating while hugging you!

subtitles.original: キミをぎゅーできるのはモココだけなんだから！
subtitles.english: I'm the only one that can hug you, so other people can't copy this!

subtitles.original: ほらほらキミもモココのことぎゅ～ってして！
subtitles.english: C'mon, now it's your turn to hug me back!

subtitles.original: せーの！今年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Ready, go! Please treat us well this year too!
